name: Sedimental Journey
description:
Inspired by such classics as Boulder Dash and Mr. Driller, a new NES-style arcade score attack is here! Can you get all the achievements?

Keymap:

Arrow keys: Move

A (X key): Drill

B (Z key): Use item

Select (Shift key): Select item

Start (Esc key): Pause

Y (A key): Quick-use scaffolding

X (S key): Quick-use dynamite

If you're on mobile, tap the screen to use the virtual gamepad.
